skills.skill: Wire field devices to control cabinets

duties_responsibilities.duty: Wire field devices to control cabinets
Install, Configure and Troubleshoot Variable Frequency Drives
Install, Configure and Troubleshoot Direct Current Drives
Install and Troubleshoot Programmable Logic Controllers from multiple manufacturers
Install and startup field level instrumentation to include Temperature, Pressure, Level, pH and Flow
Ability to interface with customers and have limited supervision in field setting
Ability to complete tasks in an efficient manner with attention to detail.
Uses equipment and tools properly and safely.
Complies with all company policies and procedures and safety requirements.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or Equivalent Required
